sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Child Support Payment Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Child Support Payment Act.

sections.heading: Payment of child support at currency exchange.
sections.text: An obligor under an order for support of a child may make any payment of child support required under that order at a currency exchange. When an obligor makes a payment of child support at a currency exchange, the obligor must provide the currency exchange with information sufficient to enable the currency exchange to transmit the amount of the payment to the State Disbursement Unit under the order for support.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
